what_you_do: Robert Heath, Sr. is a nationally recognized expert in Empowering Leadership, Executive Coaching, and transformational personal development.
who_you_serve: He equips changemakers to lead with conviction, influence with integrity, and live in alignment with the impact they were born to make.
social_proof: Robert is a Certified Master Practitioner in NLP, Hypnotherapy, TIME Techniques, and Executive Success Coaching, and also holds certifications as a Conversational Management Trainer, Executive Impact Coach, FLOW Trainer, and Why Institute Coach.
signature_programs: Legacy Leadership Consulting Group and Legacy Builders Academy
business_focus: Helping high-capacity leaders get the very best out of themselves—and those they lead.
service_provided: Empowering Leadership, Executive Coaching, Transformational Personal Development
